name: 2024 The 5th International Conference on Education and Artificial Intelligence Technologies
content: Publication: Accepted papers will be published to the special issue "International Journal of Information and Education Technology", with ISSN: 2010-3689, indexed by Scopus (Since 2019) , EI(INSPEC, IET), Electronic Journals Library, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc.
organizers: Birmingham City University, UK, Science and Engineering Institute, USA, and Bubo.AI, UK
